title: Sunny 1BR Condo Avail 9/1; One Block off Comm Ave
posting_body: Updated, well maintained 1BR unit with plenty of natural sunlight, high ceilings, and polished hardwood floors.
Fully renovated kitchen with granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances (incl.
full size refrigerator, stove/oven, microwave, and dishwasher).
Sunny living room with bay windows, bedroom with mirrored closet, large entry way with closet.
Free parking available on street with Resident Permit.
Conveniently located one block off Comm.
All within 10-15 minute walk is Cleveland Circle, Green “C” and “D” lines, Chestnut Hill Reservoir, Whole Foods, St. Elizabeth’s Hospital, Washington Square.
Beacon Hill Athletic Club is only a block away (across the street on Comm Ave).
